ISSUE.TITLE: Remove extra padding from the title on the System > Templates page
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Steps to reproduce the problem: Go to the https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/Admin/Template/List page and see the issue: ![34fc7a8f56](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16681184/86743500-96955e00-c041-11ea-8445-6267b595a4a9.jpg)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4914 Removed extra padding from the title on the System > Templates page
